fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, choose one player to be your Boywife.
- At night, visit a player. If you visit the same person as one of your Boywives, the target is now one of your Boywives.
- Your Boywives cannot attack you.
- You share a chat with the Boywives (in the polyamorous gay night chat)
- At night, if you target a Boywife, you heal him instead (through the sloppy toppy 9000)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you have no Boywives, choose another target to become a Boywife.
